story_teamrocket_03_11000/2401_1001_0100:
I’m so sorry, boss... Even though we were with
you, we—
story_teamrocket_03_11000/2401_1001_0200: No matter. We’ve completed our initial objective.
story_teamrocket_03_11000/2401_1001_0300:
There are more troublesome sync pairs on Pasio
than I initially thought.
story_teamrocket_03_11000/2401_1001_0400:
For now, let’s retreat and stay in the shadows.
We can keep implementing our plans from behind
the scenes.
story_teamrocket_03_11000/2401_1001_0600:
There’s no need for us to be in the spotlight for
every one of our schemes.
story_teamrocket_03_11000/2401_1001_0700:
I have many potential business partners on
this island.
story_teamrocket_03_11000/2401_1001_0800: But isn’t there a possibility they’d try to turn on us?
story_teamrocket_03_11000/2401_1001_0900:
If that ever happens, we just have to make it
so those who get in our way get rid of each
other instead.
